A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went to this movies with such excitement only to be so disappointed. This was a movie about a petulant pouting Luke who was disappointed things didn't go his way so he quit the Force. So slow and boring I took a bathroom break midway through. And let's not forget Lisa's newfound nonsensical ability to wake up after being blown into the universe and \"fly/float\" herself back to the ship. Seriously the too many attempts at humor felt forced and contrived. I love everything Star Wars but this movie left me feeling cheated.
